reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to enhance growth and welfare in developing countries. The project focuses on the economics of education. One of the outputs is that a course on development economics has been established in Helsink.The key activity of the project is the launching and implementation of Professor of Practice position (33 %) within the Graduate School of Economics under the administrative guidance of Aalto University. In addition financing is available for the costs of the post-graduate students.Thel costs of the project for MFA are 130.000?. In addition Aalto University provides 20 percent of total financing.
